meanings.definition: Having a mutual or reciprocal relation
meanings.sent1: The interrelated books in the series all shared characters and settings.
meanings.sent2: The interrelated concepts in the lesson helped students understand the topic better.
meanings.sent3: The interrelated puzzle pieces fit together perfectly, creating a beautiful picture.
meanings.sent4: The interrelated branches of the family tree showed how everyone was connected.
meanings.sent5: The interrelated colors in the painting blended harmoniously, creating a stunning effect.

meanings.definition: Connected or related to one another
meanings.sent1: The interrelated tasks in the project required teamwork to complete.
meanings.sent2: The interrelated departments in the company collaborated effectively for success.
meanings.sent3: The interrelated flavors in the dish complemented each other perfectly.
meanings.sent4: The interrelated plot twists in the movie kept the audience engaged.
meanings.sent5: The interrelated components of the machine worked together seamlessly to achieve the desired outcome.
